testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlDeviceInformationSubscription dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.5.4.2 [Need to Share Updated DMS Inventory] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Publish DMS Inventory Information (NTRM 3.3.5.5.1.2}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N38R601_Publish_DMS_Inventory_Information_Parameter = ${TMDD_N38R601_Publish_DMS_Inventory_Information_Parameter}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Subscribe to DMS Inventory Information (NTRM 3.3.5.5.1.3}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N38R602_Subscribe_to_DMS_Inventory_Information_Parameter = ${TMDD_N38R602_Subscribe_to_DMS_Inventory_Information_Parameter}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Error Report is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.1.4.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R15_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R15_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R380_Restrictions___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R380_Restrictions___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R381_Device_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R381_Device_Description_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Control Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R382_Device_Control_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R382_Device_Control_Type_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Controller Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R383_Controller_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R383_Controller_Description_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Roadway Network Identifier - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R384_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R384_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Identifier - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R385_Node_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R385_Node_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Name - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R386_Node_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R386_Node_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Identifier - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R387_Link_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R387_Link_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Name - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R388_Link_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R388_Link_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Direction - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R389_Link_Direction___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R389_Link_Direction___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R390_Linear_Reference___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R390_Linear_Reference___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 16 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference Version is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.12). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R391_Linear_Reference_Version_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R391_Linear_Reference_Version_Supported}

Step 17 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Route Designator - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.13). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R392_Route_Designator___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R392_Route_Designator___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 18 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Uniform Resource Locator (URL) (DeviceURL) is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.14). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R393_Device_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DeviceURL__Supported = ${TMDD_N38R393_Device_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DeviceURL__Supported}

Step 19 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device URL Reference Medium is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.15). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R394_Device_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R394_Device_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported}

Step 20 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Inventory Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.16). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R395_Device_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R395_Device_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}

Step 21 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Sign Technology is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.5.1.5.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R606_Sign_Technology_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R606_Sign_Technology_Supported}

Step 22 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Sign Pixel Height is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.5.1.5.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R607_Sign_Pixel_Height_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R607_Sign_Pixel_Height_Supported}

Step 23 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Sign Pixel Width is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.5.1.5.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R608_Sign_Pixel_Width_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R608_Sign_Pixel_Width_Supported}

Step 24 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Sign Height is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.5.1.5.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R609_Sign_Height_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R609_Sign_Height_Supported}

Step 25 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Sign Width is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.5.1.5.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R610_Sign_Width_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R610_Sign_Width_Supported}

Step 26 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Character Pixel Height is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.5.1.5.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R611_Character_Pixel_Height_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R611_Character_Pixel_Height_Supported}

Step 27 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Character Pixel Width is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.5.1.5.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R612_Character_Pixel_Width_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R612_Character_Pixel_Width_Supported}

Step 28 CONFIGURE: Determine whether DMS Beacon Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.5.1.5.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R613_DMS_Beacon_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R613_DMS_Beacon_Type_Supported}

Step 29 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vertical Border is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.5.1.5.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R614_Vertical_Border_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R614_Vertical_Border_Supported}

Step 30 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Horizontal Border is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.5.1.5.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R615_Horizontal_Border_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R615_Horizontal_Border_Supported}

Step 31 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Sign Vertical Pixel Pitch is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.5.1.5.2.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R616_Sign_Vertical_Pixel_Pitch_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R616_Sign_Vertical_Pixel_Pitch_Supported}

Step 32 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Sign Horizontal Pixel Pitch is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.5.1.5.2.12). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R617_Sign_Horizontal_Pixel_Pitch_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R617_Sign_Horizontal_Pixel_Pitch_Supported}

Step 33 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Maximum Number of Pages is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.5.1.5.2.13). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R618_Maximum_Number_of_Pages_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R618_Maximum_Number_of_Pages_Supported}

Step 34 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Maximum Message Length is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.5.1.5.2.14). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R619_Maximum_Message_Length_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R619_Maximum_Message_Length_Supported}

Step 35 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Color Scheme is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.5.1.5.2.15). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R620_Color_Scheme_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R620_Color_Scheme_Supported}

Step 36 CONFIGURE: Determine whether MULTI Tags Supported is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.5.1.5.2.16). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N38R621_MULTI_Tags_Supported_Supported = ${TMDD_N38R621_MULTI_Tags_Supported_Supported}
Step 37 CONFIGURE: Determine the number of publication message transmissions that will be received within this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationsToReceive: ${PublicationsToReceive}
Step 38 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorResponseExpected: ${PublicationErrorResponseExpected}

Step 39 CONFIGURE: IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorTypeExpected: ${PublicationErrorTypeExpected}
Step 40 CONFIGURE: Define the publication response message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: PublicationResponseMessage: ${PublicationResponseMessage}
Step 41 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the Authentication parameters need to be verified within this test. RECORD this information as: AuthenticationCheck: ${AuthenticationCheck}
Step 42 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT will be allowed access to the information requested in this test. RECORD this information as: AllowAccess: ${AllowAccess}
Step 43 CONFIGURE: Define the subscription message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionMessage: ${SubscriptionMessage}
Step 44 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected}

Step 45 CONFIGURE: IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected}

Step 46 SUBSCRIPTION-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlDeviceInformationSubscription RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED= SUBSCRIPTIONMESSAGE = SubscriptionMessage SUBSCRIPTIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected SUBSCRIPTIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION

Step 47 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.

Step 47.1 WHILE CONTINUEPUBLICATION is equal to TRUE then CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note:If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.

Step 47.1.1 PUBLICATION-EC-RECEIVE with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlDMSInventoryUpdate RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N38R601_Publish_DMS_Inventory_Information_Parameter PUBLICATIONSTORECEIVE = PublicationsToReceive PUBLICATIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorResponseExpected PUBLICATIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorTypeExpected AUTHENTICATIONCHECK = AuthenticationCheck ALLOWACCESS = AllowAccess Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION

Step 47.1.2 IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 47.1.2.1 VERIFY that a device-inventory-header data frame exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item
Step 47.1.2.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 47.1.2.3 VERIFY that a device-id data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 47.1.2.4 VERIFY that a device-location data frame exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 47.1.2.5 VERIFY that a device-name data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 47.1.2.6 VERIFY that a dMSInventoryMsg message was received.
Step 47.1.2.7 VERIFY that a device-inventory-header data frame exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item
Step 47.1.2.8 VERIFY that a dms-sign-type data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item
Step 47.1.2.9 IF TMDD_N38R380_Restrictions___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.9.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 47.1.2.10 IF TMDD_N38R381_Device_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.10.1 VERIFY that a device-description data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 47.1.2.11 IF TMDD_N38R382_Device_Control_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.11.1 VERIFY that a device-control-type data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 47.1.2.12 IF TMDD_N38R383_Controller_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.12.1 VERIFY that a controller-description data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 47.1.2.13 IF TMDD_N38R384_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.13.1 VERIFY that a network-id data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 47.1.2.14 IF TMDD_N38R385_Node_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.14.1 VERIFY that a node-id data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 47.1.2.15 IF TMDD_N38R386_Node_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.15.1 VERIFY that a node-name data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 47.1.2.16 IF TMDD_N38R387_Link_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.16.1 VERIFY that a link-id data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 47.1.2.17 IF TMDD_N38R388_Link_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.17.1 VERIFY that a link-name data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 47.1.2.18 IF TMDD_N38R389_Link_Direction___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.18.1 VERIFY that a link-direction data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 47.1.2.19 IF TMDD_N38R390_Linear_Reference___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.19.1 VERIFY that a linear-reference data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 47.1.2.20 IF TMDD_N38R391_Linear_Reference_Version_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.20.1 VERIFY that a linear-reference-version data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 47.1.2.21 IF TMDD_N38R392_Route_Designator___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.21.1 VERIFY that a route-designator data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 47.1.2.22 IF TMDD_N38R393_Device_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DeviceURL__Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.22.1 VERIFY that a device-url data frame exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 47.1.2.23 IF TMDD_N38R394_Device_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.23.1 VERIFY that an url-reference-medium data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item.device-inventory-header.device-url
Step 47.1.2.24 IF TMDD_N38R395_Device_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.24.1 VERIFY that a last-update-time data frame exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 47.1.2.25 IF TMDD_N38R606_Sign_Technology_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.25.1 VERIFY that a signTechnology data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item
Step 47.1.2.26 IF TMDD_N38R607_Sign_Pixel_Height_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.26.1 VERIFY that a signHeightPixels data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item
Step 47.1.2.27 IF TMDD_N38R608_Sign_Pixel_Width_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.27.1 VERIFY that a signWidthPixels data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item
Step 47.1.2.28 IF TMDD_N38R609_Sign_Height_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.28.1 VERIFY that a signHeight data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item
Step 47.1.2.29 IF TMDD_N38R610_Sign_Width_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.29.1 VERIFY that a signWidth data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item
Step 47.1.2.30 IF TMDD_N38R611_Character_Pixel_Height_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.30.1 VERIFY that a charHeightPixels data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item
Step 47.1.2.31 IF TMDD_N38R612_Character_Pixel_Width_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.31.1 VERIFY that a charWidthPixels data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item
Step 47.1.2.32 IF TMDD_N38R613_DMS_Beacon_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.32.1 VERIFY that a dms-beacon-type data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item
Step 47.1.2.33 IF TMDD_N38R614_Vertical_Border_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.33.1 VERIFY that a dms-vertical-border data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item
Step 47.1.2.34 IF TMDD_N38R615_Horizontal_Border_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.34.1 VERIFY that a dms-horizontal-border data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item
Step 47.1.2.35 IF TMDD_N38R616_Sign_Vertical_Pixel_Pitch_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.35.1 VERIFY that a dms-vertical-pixel-pitch data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item
Step 47.1.2.36 IF TMDD_N38R617_Sign_Horizontal_Pixel_Pitch_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.36.1 VERIFY that a dms-horizontal-pixel-pitch data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item
Step 47.1.2.37 IF TMDD_N38R618_Maximum_Number_of_Pages_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.37.1 VERIFY that a dms-max-pages data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item
Step 47.1.2.38 IF TMDD_N38R619_Maximum_Message_Length_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.38.1 VERIFY that a dms-max-message-length data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item
Step 47.1.2.39 IF TMDD_N38R620_Color_Scheme_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.39.1 VERIFY that a dms-color-scheme data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item
Step 47.1.2.40 IF TMDD_N38R621_MULTI_Tags_Supported_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 47.1.2.40.1 VERIFY that a dms-multi-tag-support data element exists within each instance of data frame dMSInventoryMsg.dms-inventory-item
Step 47.1.2.41 VERIFY that the values within the REQUEST message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 47.1.2.42 CONFIGURE: Set CONTENTVERIFIED to True

Step 47.1.2.43 POSTCONDITION: PUBLICATION-EC-REPLY with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlDMSInventoryUpdate RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N38R601_Publish_DMS_Inventory_Information_Parameter CONTENTVERIFIED = CONTENTVERIFIED PUBLICATIONRESPONSEMESSAGE = PublicationResponseMessage

Step 48 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 48.1 VERIFY that an errorReportMsg message was received.
Step 48.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 48.3 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 48.4 VERIFY that an error-code data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 48.5 VERIFY that an error-text data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 48.6 VERIFY that data element error-code is set to SubscriptionErrorResponseTypeExpected.
Step 48.7 IF TMDD_N38R15_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 48.7.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 49 EXIT
